sys_openapi_operation.name: Partially update sprint
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Partially update sprint","fOperationId":"partiallyUpdateSprint","fDescription":"Performs a partial update of a sprint. A partial update means that fields not present in the request JSON will not be updated.

Notes:

  • Sprints that are in a closed state cannot be updated.
  • A sprint can be started by updating the state to 'active'. This requires the sprint to be in the 'future' state and have a startDate and endDate set.
  • A sprint can be completed by updating the state to 'closed'. This action requires the sprint to be in the 'active' state. This sets the completeDate to the time of the request.
  • Other changes to state are not allowed.
  • The completeDate field cannot be updated manually.
","fPath":"/agile/1.0/sprint/{sprintId}","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson9254588189","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"id","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"int64","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"},{"fName":"self","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uri","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"state","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"name","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"startDate","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"endDate","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"},{"fName":"completeDate","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusive
